title: Minimoon Algeria
description: E-commerce fashion website for the Minimoon brand in Algeria, built with Next.js and Strapi.
details: A modern eCommerce solution with product filters, dynamic categories, and Arabic/English support for Algerian customers.

title: Profix Maintenance System
description: A platform that tracks and manages maintenance schedules for water filter sales and services.
details: Built with Laravel and Filament, Profix enables admins, merchants, and salesmen to manage customer maintenance plans easily.

title: Ranking Waral
description: SEO-optimized business website built on WordPress.
details: A clean corporate site focused on ranking performance and lead generation with fast-loading pages.

title: Altaawon Factory
description: Industrial factory website with SEO optimization and bilingual support.
details: Showcases factory products and services in both Arabic and English with strong on-page SEO.

title: Portal Nafir
description: Mentorship platform connecting mentors with mentees across Africa and the Gulf.
details: Developed with Next.js, TRPC, and Tailwind CSS, this portal manages user roles and mentor-mentee interactions.

title: Dantech Electromechanical
description: Company portfolio website for electromechanical services.
details: A high-performing corporate site with SEO-optimized structure and mobile-friendly design.

title: Terminus POS Tracker
description: A platform for tracking and managing Point of Sale (POS) systems and their performance in real time.
details: Terminus is a custom platform that helps businesses monitor and control POS devices, generate sales analytics, and track team performance efficiently.

title: Smart Sudan POS Management System
description: A complete Point of Sale management platform tailored for Sudanese businesses.
details: Smart Sudan helps merchants track inventory, sales, and employee performance with an intuitive dashboard and real-time reports. Designed for scalability and offline-first operation.

title: Hope ONG
description: A humanitarian organization providing aid and support to refugees in Sudan and Algeria.
details: Hope ONG is focused on delivering essential services, resources, and programs for displaced communities in Sudan and Algeria.
